lore: Mega armour comprises massive slabs of metal bashed roughly into shape, and is powered by pistons and sheer brute strength. It is highly resilient and can mount an array of potent weaponry. It is also usually worn to battle by toof-rich Nobz who would be scary enough even were they not each wearing their own Ork-portable bunker.
